00135 // Internal information to ServoToGo
00136 typedef union
00137 {
00138     unsigned long                       all;
00139     struct {unsigned char  A, B, C, D;} port;
00140 } IO32;
00141 
00142 // Internal information to ServoToGo
00143 typedef union
00144 {
00145     long           Long;
00146     unsigned char  Byte[4];
00147 } LONGBYTE;
00148 
00149 // Internal information to ServoToGo
00150 typedef union
00151 {
00152     unsigned short                          Word;
00153     struct   {unsigned char    high, low;}  Byte;
00154 } WORDBYTE;
